ques: The meaning of the poem is ________ and open to interpretation.
The earthquake caused the land to ________ several feet.
The company decided to ________ the employee's contract.
She used a ________ to visualize the company's growth over time.
Each ________ in the essay addresses a specific point.
Please follow the safety ________ while operating the machinery.
He attended the conference via a ________ platform.
Her statement seemed to ________ what she had said earlier.
The quality control team will ________ each product before shipment.
The selection process is completely ________.
His statement was intentionally ________, leaving room for doubt.
The company has established clear ________ for employee conduct.
The new policy is expected to ________ many workers.
The evidence presented in court seemed to ________ the defendant's alibi.
The introductory ________ sets the tone for the entire article.
The landlord may choose to ________ the lease agreement.
The doctor created a ________ to track the patient's progress.
In a ________ world, you can interact with digital environments.
The health inspector regularly visits restaurants to ________ hygiene.
He picked a ________ book from the library shelf.
Please read the following ________ carefully.
He did not want to ________ his previous testimony.
It's essential to ________ the vehicle before a long road trip.
The message in the painting is deliberately ________.
The flooding has ________ numerous families from their homes.
The winners were chosen through a ________ drawing.
The government issued ________ for social distancing during the pandemic.
The company offers ________ tours of its facilities.
A ________ is a helpful tool for displaying data.
The decision to ________ the project was due to budget constraints.
The witness's account ________ with the security camera footage.
The ship's captain studied the navigation ________.
The building inspector will ________ the construction site tomorrow.
The experiment involved assigning subjects to groups in a ________ manner.
The development project may ________ wildlife from their habitat.
The teacher provided ________ for completing the assignment.
The video game creates a ________ reality for players.
The final ________ summarizes the main ideas of the text.
The school principal had to ________ the disruptive behavior.
The instructions were somewhat ________, causing confusion.
The project manager outlined the ________ for the team.
The software will ________ the operation if an error occurs.
The candidate's position on the issue remained ________.
The samples were collected at ________ intervals.
The team held a ________ meeting to discuss the project.
Can you identify the topic sentence in this ________?
The technology will likely ________ traditional methods.
The ________ showed a clear upward trend in sales.
The authorities will ________ the safety measures at the event.
The facts presented by the two parties appeared to ________ each other.
